evidence: Single package structure with multiple cohesive modules (sgd/ directory containing related functionality)
Clear separation of concerns with distinct modules: cache, gdrive, meta, routes, streams, utils
Shared dependencies between modules following a structured pattern
No evidence of distributed services or microservices communication
Average fan-out of 3.29 indicates moderate inter-module dependencies
Maximum directory depth of 2 suggests flat, organized structure
risks: Tight coupling between modules through direct imports
Potential for circular dependencies as system grows
Single package structure may not scale well for larger applications
Low maintainability index (61.2 average) could indicate architectural rigidity
